    • Installation¶

    Clone the project:

    $ git clone git@github.com:Vauxoo/odoo-network.git

    Declare the downloaded folder in your addons-path on Odoo:

    $ ./openerp-server --addons-path=addons,/path/downloaded/odoo-network
